Hello all the twitterians. Sorry I have been off the screen for a while. Just couldn't get the time. Now I am back on. How have you been?
Visiting with a very heavy schedule. Had a great day in Rome with Confidustria representing Italian manufacturing and services companies.
Addressed the well attended meeting on trade & investment opportunities for Italian firms in Uganda followed by a very interactive exchange.
Now left for Milan to do the same and also address a leading Think Tank on regional security. We've been received with incredible enthusiasm
@kasujja hello Alan. I hope you are well in Uk. Occasionally I hear your booming voice. Doing very well as always.
@kasujja You and the other Ugandan expatriates in UK make us proud.
@kasujja the DR Congo question is of course a complex one, but my view is that the only solution is dialogue and mutual accommodation.
@NJenfrances @mulagoforreviva I asked someone to compare the cost of having every MP posses and use an iPad.
@NJenfrances @mulagoforreviva It definitely is cheaper in terms of output i.e. work output. If we were able to save on paper for docs etc..
@NJenfrances @mulagoforreviva it may make greater sense. Of course the MPs who wish to improve their performance already have them.
@NJenfrances @mulagoforreviva Thats the way to go
@pkuiper there is a private member's bill in Parliament. It has not been debated yet. I think the world should let Uganda debate it freely.
@pkuiper I know there are those that support it and those that oppose it. The MP who proposed it only exercised his right to do so.
@caleb79ady yes as i am sure you have been following in the media Govt. is making every effort to plug the loopholes
@sammytamz membership is registered at the village. If u are not sure about your village contact the National Secretariat.
@AkampuriraB Its just a political smear campaign.
@AkampuriraB @other You are right. It is a serious challenge that needs stemming now.
@AkampuriraB Thats precisely what Gvt. is trying to do. First we are reorienting national education to skills development.
@AkampuriraB main purpose is 2 eradicate the mismatch between our educational system & the labour market. We plan to impart skills on demand
@AkampuriraB Second we are pushing a programme of industrialisation. Right now I am in Italy wooing industrialists to invest in Uganda.
@AkampuriraB That is the way to create jobs.
@Wabwire1 sorry I was not able to meet your desire to meet me. I hope we can do so soon. Best regards.
@BorjeMelin there will be vigorous debate by either side of the spectrum.
@CetlyenIvy I must have missed the court proceedings. Which Court?
@XXLTVSHOWUGANDA i am fine. i hope we will catch up soon.
@jijulesII I am sure that was a media misrepresentation. How could I be named in the stealing of money in the OPM?
@daveytr Investigations are going on. Th A G produced his report. The Police is at work. I requested all development partners 2 do the same.
@daveytr We all need to be patient because I have no doubt that all the culprits will be exposed.
@MukasaAndrew5 I agree. we are trying to figure out how to achieve that within the law.
@EdgarThirty when they're very rude I ignore them because I wouldn't allow myself 2 go 2 their level.
@kiapi40KFreddie GBU too!
@Rajrob Thank you for the invitation. I am sure with proper arrangement it is possible.
@kasujja @AmamaMbabazi well Alan, FDC chose Gen. Muntu. I congratulate them on their success in electing new leaders.
@kasujja @AmamaMbabazi Lets wait and see what happens. Leadership is an art that can be acquired.
@RedLipsteeq I must have missed them!
@Wabwire1 I will check it out when I go back to office soon.
@kulewalid I am fine thank you. The office has quite a few hitches, but they are being sorted.
@kulewalid the sooner that oil debate is over, the better for our country. I am sure it will be over soon.
